metadata.description:
Presenting a parade of bold beauties to make your nights (and even your days) an adventure with the steamiest of steampunk femme fashion! Oh, the mysteries they uncover! The discoveries you can make! They bedazzle with boots and bodices, captivate in camisoles and corsets, or fly or ride hard and fast in jackets and jodhpurs. Beautiful and practical, these daring damsels' outfits may be more leather (and brass) than lace, but their gear will spin your gears fast enough to overheat!

When adventure calls, these daring damsels are ready to answer, clad in their most flirtatious/functional finery and strapping on their goggles and steam-powered accessories. They'll stoke the boilers of your heart!
metadata.name: Victorian Secret: Girls of Steampunk
